column1: Uchi////My friend thought the "Tears of Dawn" dessert was fantastic
column3: I think it was a bit too avant garde for my tastes. Sweet frozen melon with a lemon foam
column5: and an elderflower with a "dirt"-like texture left me really amazed by the excellent execution of these complex tastes
column6: but still kinda craving a snickers bar afterwards. If you live for the liminal interplay of flavors
column7: this dish is for you. If you're an ogre like me
column8: then I might suggest something more traditional.
